<<<<<<< HEAD
A declaration of His Highness Prince Rupert. With a narrative of the state and condition of the city and garrison of Bristoll, when his Highnesse Prince Rupert came thither: of the actions there during the siege, of the treaties, and rendition thereof. Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.
[2], 34 p.
Printed by Edward Griffin., London, : 1645.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb: 11th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 34 p.
Printed by Edward Griffin., London, : 1645.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb: 11th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
